Quality Assurance / Quality Control (QA/QC) Lead, Fiber Operations Job at ipNX Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        ipNX is one of Nigeria’s fastest growing Information and Communications Technology companies, serving a multitude of needs across enterprises, small businesses and residents with innovative, world-class services.

Our ability to identify, satisfy and exceed today’s market needs is a testament to over a decade of experience, our commitment, drive and passion realized through highly skilled and well seasoned professionals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Assurance / Quality Control (QA/QC) Lead, Fiber Operations

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Reporting to the Head of Infrastructure Quality, the Team Lead is required to manage the following:
	
		Spot Checks and Reporting of Outside Plant Fiber Activities
		Milestone and Final Acceptance Testing
		Escalations and Enforcement of Quality
		As Built Documentation
		Maintaining and Updating Standards and Specification Documentation for Training purposes
		You will report to the Head of Infrastructure Quality and contribute to the overall Quality Objectives of the Infrastructure Division.
		You are tasked with ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction and operational excellence during all levels of engagements with customers and stakeholders,proactively providing support and input when required. You are also required to build capacity and develop teams working with you.
	
	


Responsibilities


	Quality Assurance And Compliance on All Outside Plant Deployments and Operations.
	Periodic Audit and Verification of As Maintained Information and Records.
	Updating and Maintaining Standards and Specifications.
	Documentation.
	Updating and Maintaining Training Documentation.
	Weekly, Monthly and Quarterly Reporting on Performance Indices as required in the Infrastructure Quality Unit.
	Build and maintain a healthy relationship with customers and stakeholders
	Drive internal and external training initiatives for team members.


Qualifications / Experience


	B.Eng Civil Engineering or Electrical Engineering.
	5 years of experience in Turnkey Fiber Deployment and Civil Works standards and specifications.
	Good understanding of Microsoft Office Suite including MS Project.
	Conversant with the Use of CAD and GIS.
	CFOT is an added advantage.
	Good Knowledge of Fiber Turnkey Deployments and Civil Works and Materials standards.
	Conversant with Microsoft Office Tools, AutoCAD/Visio, A good knowledge of GIS will be an added advantage
	Excellent Communication and Presentation Skills.


Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Outlet Sales Representative",
  "description": "Jemimah Nig. Ltd was incorporated in 1991 as a small company trading in household pumps, Jemimah has grown into a well organized corporate organization with fully fledged offices and showrooms in four major Nigerian cities. Jemimah is partnered with various OEM&rsquo;s around the world to ensure we provide the best quality products to the Nigerian fluid sector. Jemimah Nig. Ltd is poised to be the leading provider of fluid solutions technology in Nigeria. We are inspired to achieve this through committed associations. We strive to be the most innovative ,competitive and efficient in providing a product mix of pumps, tanks, treatment solutions, etc to the Nigerian market

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Outlet Sales Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Orile, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	This is a full-time, on-site role for a Sales Representative located in Yaba, Lagos.
	The Sales Representative will be responsible for identifying potential customers, presenting product offerings, managing customer relationships, and meeting sales targets.
	Daily tasks include conducting sales visits, preparing sales proposals, negotiating contracts, and providing after-sales support.
	The role requires maintaining up-to-date knowledge of product features and capabilities, and staying informed about market trends and competitor activities.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE qualification with 2 - 3 years of work experience.
	Sales skills, including identifying potential customers and closing sales
	Strong communication and negotiation skills
	Ability to manage customer relationships and provide excellent customer service
	Knowledge of product features and water industry trends
	Experience with preparing sales proposals and contracts
	Proficiency in presenting product offerings
	Strong organizational and time management abilities
	Experience in the water supply or building services industry is an advantage.


Salary
